overall_summary: EU coal power capacity has gone down significantly in the past few years. This is quite significant
dumbbell_text: Coal capacity in the EU has falled in all 27 countries since 2000
bar_text: Only 100 MW of coal is currently under development country in the EU

overall_summary: G20 coal power capacity has remained largely the same in the past few years. This is quite significant
dumbbell_text: Coal capacirt in G20 countries has remained largely unchanged
bar_text: Only Turkey has coal currently under development in the G20
